Package primitives

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    CoordinateTransformation
    This interface is intended to represent lambdas which take two coordinates and return a new Coordinate which is a transformation of the first, possibly using the second to aid the calculation.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Coordinate
    The Coordinate class represents a distance along a single axis.
    NormalizedVector
    This class represents a special kind of Vector whose length is one.
    Point
    The Point class represents a Point in three dimensional space.
    Ray
    The Ray class represents a ray with it's base at the Point 'source' and shoots off in direction pointed at by Vector 'direction'.
    Util
    Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
    Vector
    The Vector class represents a Vector with it's base at the origin and it's head at the Point 'head'.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    ZeroVectorException
    This exception is thrown when an attempt is made to create a zero vector.
